description: This video will walk through various steps of transformation, including a few queries, and conclude with how our end-users could get at the data marts we've created for them. We'll wrap-up this video by discussing the current limitations of this work, our refactoring efforts, and where we want to take HTSQL over the years to come.

title: Clark C  Evans: Multi Database Colaboration and Extract - Transform - Load with HTSQL
